Text:
How do you actually add Chinese to the "Choose a language level"???
I have added spanish and french correctly and they work. Also did the Chinese correctly but its not in the language screen. 
Any ideas?

So, without speech means that there is no audio, or mic interface right? If so, can we expect a speech version soon?

Props man, you are such a lifesaver. I expect to be quite the polyglot because of you.
